arrays.q1: How do you type out all items in an array?
arrays.a1: With a for loop or with the forEach() method
arrays.a2: It is when two methods are used in a row on the same array. As the methods donâ€™t change the original array the methods wiki be added subsequently in whatever order they have been placed

for loops.q1: How do you write a for loop?
for loops.a1: const arr = [item1, item2, item3] for (let i = 0; i< arr.length; i++){console.log(arr[i])}

callbacks.a1: When the functions of a program are called and executed at the exact moment at a later stage. Asynchronous programming allow the computer to run other functions while functions are waiting to be called.
callbacks.a2: A function passed into another function as a parameter
